alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 3:20PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Lander and west central Eureka Counties through 345 PM PDT... At 319 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 11 miles northwest of Grass Valley, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Tenabo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
